original_text: Additionally, any service degradation events triggering failover will be reported to the relevant National Competent Authority (NCA) within 24 hours, as stipulated by PSD2 incident reporting guidelines.
units: Additionally , any service degradation events triggering failover will be reported to the relevant National Competent Authority ( NCA ) within 24 hours , as stipulated by PSD2 incident reporting guidelines .
as stipulated by PSD2 incident reporting guidelines
